General.Name: Mitake Information
General.Description: Mitake Information Corporation operates in the information service software industry in Taiwan. It offers mobile securities trading systems; voice quotation trading systems; mobile banking application systems; telecom value added action finance products; TV viewing innovation research and development, APP research and development customization, enterprise short message sending system, enterprise EIM instant messaging solution. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 39, Xinsheng North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
